projects.name: Anra
projects.description: Anra is a strategy-adventure side-scrolling 2d platformer game about the journey of a robot in an exoplanet to find a new home for humanity.

projects.name: AAT4BAD
projects.description: Always A Time For Being A Duck is an adventure side-scrolling 2d platformer game about the journey of a father duck in a park full of children to go back to his family.

projects.name: SLTL
projects.description: Something Left To Lose is a psychological adventure game about a bullied boy who is trying to escape from the voices in his head.
